name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @WhisperStarWind Well, the first thing I will do when I ascend the throne is to send all the zero-clearing factions to quarantine for protection, and let everyone else live their lives normally

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Haven't some Chinese people figured it out yet? Whether you support zero-COVID or lying down, this is not something that the public has the final say on.
MRNA vaccines are not popularized? It doesn't matter. No scientific research was done in advance? I don't care.
Dad doesn't care about your health and feelings at all. If he says he wants to let go, he must let you go. You can't refuse, you have no choice.
All your feelings are just because you happened to stand on his side at the beginning.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some idiots are still yelling that the voices of the bandits are too loud, the country has to let go, and I'm going to go to the streets to kill the bandits.
Let's not talk about whether the voice of the people can influence policies
If the voices supporting the liberalization are really that loud, is there a possibility that this is the "voice of the people"?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
If you are a firm believer in zero-COVID, you should hold the government accountable for forcibly releasing the virus without popularizing the mRNA vaccine and publishing the corresponding treatment plan.
Instead of talking nonsense about going out to the streets to kill the lying bandits.
What is a lying bandit? You have been locked up at home for three years, without having to make money, support your family, or worry about not being able to afford food or pay your mortgage. You get up every day and use three phones while watching Douyin, playing games, and taking online classes. You are the lying bandit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @liuyangeming In fact, if you really observe the Chinese Internet every day, you will find that in fact most people think this way.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
There is a post from a netizen
I can only say that even if the European and American advertisers leave, there is still a big foreign propaganda.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Now looking back at my previous views on China's epidemic prevention, I find that I think too much.
In fact, there is no dead end at all. Worrying about what will happen to the people? That's all unnecessary.
The one who is in charge is like a bulldozer. He can hit wherever he wants and doesn't care whether you live or die.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As of today, Xinjiang has been under lockdown for 100 days.
Do you think this is the limit?
No
The border town of Dongxing, Guangxi has been under lockdown for 9 months

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/fPlfYehQe6

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: That's the opposite.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing still requires 24-hour nucleic acid testing, but many testing sites were withdrawn today, causing everyone to take longer to test nucleic acid.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: China's epidemic prevention is entering the most chaotic stage. People in Shijiazhuang are wailing because they don't have to do nucleic acid tests. People in Chongqing have their arms twisted because they don't want to do nucleic acid tests.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:

Residents pushed down the isolation fence and were arrested

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After Zhengzhou University was unsealed (a false unsealing, only the cafeteria was allowed to buy meals, and supermarkets and express delivery were closed), the time, number of people, and location for buying meals were restricted, so the scene below, which was like a religious ceremony, appeared. Students lined up for three hours to get to the window.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Submitting an article to Teacher Li,
This is the third time they have written about a dormitory in a double first-class university in Beijing. The first two times they wrote about it were similar to this one, and there were no reactionary slogans, but they were ordered to be taken down in the end. I don’t know how it will be this time.
